aboutUs.title: ABOUT US
aboutUs.description: Our YELLOW HELP team works every day to help needy Kharkiv residents in this difficult time.

achievements.title: Our achievements in a month
achievements.description: During April, our team managed to help many Kharkiv residents on its own, but there are still many who need help every day!
achievements.humanitarianHelp: applications for humanitarian aid were completed
achievements.titleHelp: We helped more than 32,000 Kharkiv residents

program.title: Our program "Save a life"
program.description: Targeted delivery of quality nutrition sets to socially unprotected population, such as elderly and people with disabilities, mothers with children etc. in Kharkiv, Ukraine
program.descriptionHelp: We are currently helping 3,670 people at our own expense by delivering them 4-5 humanitarian sets a month!
program.descriptionHelpNow: Today our team has the opportunity to help 10,000 people in Kharkiv by delivering 50,000 product sets every month!
program.nowHelpDescription: Were helping by delivering 20,000 food sets in a month
program.needHelpDescription: To help by delivering 50,000 food sets every month, we are in need for funds

cost.title: The main costs for the implementation of the program per month
cost.foodDescription: product sets - 20 USD / set 50 000 sets per month
cost.applicationDescription: processing of applications - 0,14 USD / applic 10 000 people
cost.packageDescription: formation of sets - 0,14 USD / set 50 000 sets
